title: Zen Courtyard
description: A modern interpretation of a traditional Japanese dry garden, featuring drought-tolerant planting suitable for the California climate.

title: Coastal Retreat
description: Sustainable landscaping for a boutique hotel, utilizing native grasses and permeable paving to reduce runoff.

title: Urban Oasis
description: Transforming a small city backyard into a lush, multi-level garden for relaxation and entertaining.
